result.eng: Is Irish difficult, in your opinion?

result.eng: It was difficult to maintain peace in the divided society of Northern Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireann
result.orig: Bhí sé deacair síocháin a choimeád i sochaí scoilte Thuaisceart na hÉireann

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé deacair síoċáin a ċoimeád i soċaí scoilte Ṫuaisceart na hÉireannIt was difficult to maintain peace in the divided society of Northern Ireland.

result.html: Bhí sé rud beag deacairIt was a little difficult.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé rud beag deacairIt was a little difficult.

result.eng: It is always difficult to enter new markets.
result.ga: Bíonn sé deacair dul isteach i margaí nua

result.ponchtml: Bíonn sé deacair dul isteaċ i margaí nuaIt is always difficult to enter new markets.

result.html: Is deacair baint leisHe's very touchy.

result.html: Tá an cheist deacairThe question is hard.

result.html: Tá sé ag éirí deacairIt is getting difficult.
